data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module is used to generate fake data, for use during
    development of database applications for example. Rather than trying
    to do development on real data (which may get you into trouble if
    you ask for help and end up posting real user information on the
    internet somewhere), or the old standby of creating a handful of
    users named 'Foo Bar', this module will let you generate as much
    fake data as you need of various types (people's names, addresses,
    phone numbers, hostnames, etc)
